testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: User can add product from Accessories to shopping-cart
testcase.system-out: Given User logs-in to his account...........................................passed When hovers on the Accessories category.....................................passed And chooses shoes subcategory...............................................passed Then redirected to the shoes subcategory showing Shoes header...............passed When filters all pairs of shoes by Price from low to high...................passed Then all pairs of shoes will be sorted by price.............................passed When views details of the chosen shoes product..............................passed Then redirected to Dorian shoes details.....................................passed When selects color of the shoes product.....................................passed And chooses size of the shoes product.......................................passed And adds to cart............................................................passed Then redirected to the checkout-cart........................................passed

testcase.classname: user logs-in using username and password
testcase.name: user logs-in using valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the login webpage...................................passed When user enters "boogiemon@divalia.cf" and "123456"........................passed Then user is logged-in to his account.......................................passed

testcase.classname: user logs-in using username and password
testcase.name: user logs-in using valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the login webpage...................................passed When user enters "boogiemon@divalia.cf" and "654321"........................passed Then user is not logged-in to his account...................................passed

testcase.classname: user registers using his personal info
testcase.name: user registers with valid data
